name: Cheese
description: A cheese pizza. what else can you say?
criticism: I'm a bigger fan of toppings, so there's not much improvement to be made

name: Pepperoni
criticism: Can still be a bit plain, but usually more enjoyable than cheese alone

name: Meat Lovers
description: A lot of meat to give it plenty of flavor
criticism: Too much meat honestly, needs variety

name: Supreme
description: A bit of everything, has good topping variety
criticism: Can sometimes be too much depending on other toppings

name: Hawaiian
description: Underrated pizza, hated by many. Much better than people give it credit
criticism: I think pepperoni goes much better with pineapple than ham

name: Barbecue Chicken
description: Strange combo that's really satisfying, niche pizza
criticism: Sometimes the barbecue can be way too sweet in combination with the onions
